name: Perang Pandemi
description:
[INA] Bercerita tentang seorang anak yang berjuang melawan pandemi covid dengan cara mengumpulkan peralatan kesehatan untuk mengumpulkan score. Terdapat tantangan seperti kerumunan orang-orang dan halangan lain, seperti kelelawar dan virus.

[ENG] Tells the story of a child who struggles against the covid pandemic by collecting medical equipment to collect scores. There are challenges like crowds of people and other obstacles, like bats and viruses.
